title: My live wallpaper keeps crashing on my Pixel 3. Any ideas why/how to fix this please?
content: For some reason, out of nowhere, I keep getting a message on my home screen saying that my live wallpaper has stopped. I have stopped the app and tried rebooting my phone, but it keeps happening. I'm using the Marvellous Marble wallpaper (planet earth with live weather from weather.com). Any ideas if I can fix this, or is there a deeper problem with the wallpaper?
